data.comment: The big names in today's match at Children's Mercy Park have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Kansas City.
An attacking Chicago player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 1, Tim Melia for Kansas City has been booked by Marcos De Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Kansas City.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
In the minute 6, Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Chicago.
Chicago needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Kansas City throw-in in Chicago's half.
In the minute 7, In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Chicago push upfield but Marcos De Oliveira quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
In the minute 10, Kansas City to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Kansas City are caught offside.
Throw-in Chicago.
In the minute 12, Kansas City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 15, Free kick Kansas City.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Chicago a goal kick.
At Children's Mercy Park, Chicago are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 18, Chicago's Fabian Herbers has been booked in Kansas City.
Graham Zusi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Francisco Calvo (Chicago) has received a yellow card from Marcos De Oliveira.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 21, Jaylin Lindsey (Kansas City) has replaced the possibly injured Graham Zusi at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 24, Roger Espinoza (Kansas City) gets a yellow card.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Chicago have a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Johnny Russell (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 28, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 31, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Kansas City.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kansas City drive upfield and Khiry Shelton gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Chicago defender.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Chicago throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Chicago drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Fabian Herbers (Chicago) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Kansas City.
In the minute 41, Kansas City to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kansas City are coming forward and Gianluca Busio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 43, Marcos De Oliveira awards Chicago a goal kick.
Great shot from Chicago's Djordje Mihailovic but he is denied by the crossbar.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kansas City have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Chicago's area.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Children's Mercy Park.
The second-half is underway in Kansas City.
In the minute 46, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
The home team have replaced Roger Espinoza with Daniel Salloi. This is the second substitution made today by Peter Vermes.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 50, Chicago are whistled for offside.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Kansas City.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
At Children's Mercy Park, Boris Sekulic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 58, Chicago make their first substitution with Przemyslaw Frankowski replacing Fabian Herbers.
Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?
In the minute 60, Gianluca Busio has recovered and rejoins the match in Kansas City.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gianluca Busio.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Chicago are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 62, Chicago to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Kansas City will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Chicago.
Winston Reid is booked for the home team.
In the minute 64, Johnny Russell for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Chicago at Children's Mercy Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Chicago in the half of Kansas City.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 67, Kansas City's Winston Reid scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Johnny Russell instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 69, Marcos De Oliveira signals a Chicago throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Felipe Hernandez.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Daniel Salloi of Kansas City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 73, Chicago are caught offside.
C.J. Sapong is replacing Boris Sekulic for the away team.
The away team replace Brandt Bronico with Johan Kappelhof.
In the minute 74, Kansas City are pushing forward but Jaylin Lindsey's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Chicago.
In Kansas City, Gadi Kinda of Kansas City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 76, Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Johnny Russell (Kansas City) has received a first yellow card.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 79, Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Elliot Collier is on a sub for Ignacio Aliseda for Chicago.
Mike Azira is on a sub for Djordje Mihailovic for Chicago.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 80, Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) has received a yellow card from Marcos De Oliveira.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Kansas City a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Chicago's Mike Azira gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kansas City defender.
In the minute 84, Elliot Collier gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chicago.
Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
In the minute 88, Kansas City needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
Erik Hurtado is replacing Johnny Russell for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Kansas City throw-in in Chicago's half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Kansas City's area.
Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Chicago.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Kansas City.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
